review_data.title: Grosse Portionen, freundliches Personal aber kein gutes Essen.
review_data.content: Die Teigwaren waren hart, Sauce hat nicht gut geschmeckt und der Parmesan war kein Parmesan. Wir habe alle drei Teller...More

review_data.title: Gute italienische Küche
review_data.content: Liebevolle Bewirtung und gutes Essen. Sehr freundliche Bedienung und auch im Freien viel Platz. Sehr gute Atmosphäre.

review_data.title: Im Geschehen
review_data.content: Wir tranken hier an einem schönen Sommermorgen etwas. Ausserdem assen wir eine Portion Parmaschinken mit Melone. Die Portion war gross...More

review_data.title: Top Café frühmorgens
review_data.content: Sehr sympathisches Café mit guter Qualität bei Getränken, Speisen und Bedienung. Typische Ambiance, bei warmen Temperaturen grosser Aussenbereich

review_data.title: Good for coffee drinks not the sandwiches
review_data.content: Hot sandwich obelix says zucchini and mozzarella Unfortunately hardly any cheese so definite not worth 12.5!! Piadina was ok but again overpriced at 13.5 Ambience ok As mentioned good for a drink skip the food

review_data.title: Unscheinbare Perle am Limmatplatz!
review_data.content: als ich heute zum zweiten mal hier war mit einem abstand von drei wochen, hatmich die zuvorkommende kellnerin gleich wiedererkannt...More

review_data.title: Great Coffee
review_data.content: Can't tell about the food and also not really about the ambience. I go to this place for coffee to go. And about that I can say that they have one of the best coffees in Zürich - definitely better than Café Lang which is...More

review_data.title: A good place to sit outside in the summer and traffic
review_data.content: If you enjoy watching the traffic at the square, you are in an excellent position in this café. The square is quite busy, trams come and go and the public is very diverse.

review_data.title: Best lunch ever
review_data.content: I visit the Caffeteria am Limmatplatz very often, I have never been disappointed or got something that I didnt like. The food is great and the staff very friendly.

review_data.title: super location !
review_data.content: ein nicht trendy lokal, mit super netten wirten, tollem service und schöner ambiente ! das beste caffee in der gegend...More

review_data.title: Quite Cafe
review_data.content: Nice place to have a quiet coffee at the busy Limmatplatz. Not so busy as the trendy other places around but good service.

review_data.title: A nice, simple café at Limmatplatz
review_data.content: Caffeteria am Limmatplatz is a simple cafe located at this bustling intersection. They have several rows of sidewalk seating all facing Limmatplatz and inside the seating is very basic, but comfortable with huge windows also with views of the square. Their menu features hot/cold beverages,...More
